channel.title: Touchpad Problem. Please Help
channel.description:
hey guys, i have a small problem with my laptop, my mouse [touchpad] works fine and it right clicks but it won't left click. its not a hardware problem because i tried putting another mouse on and its the same problem. i have done a virus scan and nothing is wrong.
also if i reboot there is a 50-50 chance it works..
any one know what is the problem?
thank you.

item.title: Touchpad Problem. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

go to mouse settings and check for anything abnormal

Read full topic

item.title: Touchpad Problem. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

If anything, you can always tap the touchpad to left click!

Read full topic
